## 3. DESCRIPTION (Final Public Copy)
A glowing CRT, a rainy neon skyline, and a retro vaporwave desk filled with analog gear.
This 3-hour LoFi & Synthwave vaporwave mix is built for deep focus, coding, studying, writing, or late-night creative energy.
Bright retro tones meet calming neon ambience for a perfect long-session listening environment.
